p: Unfortunately, the Erechtites essential oils also show toxicity to representative non-target organisms, with LC 50 values against the midge larvae ( C. tentans) and the zebrafish ( D. rerio) comparable to those for laboratory-reared mosquito larvae. The small crustacean ( D. magna) was particularly susceptible to the Erechtites essential oils. Therefore, care must be taken if these essential oils are to be used in broad applications. Local application of Erechtites essential oils (e.g., urban areas) may prove useful as controls for container-breeding mosquitoes, however.
